name: drugdata_categorical_201708
title: Drug Cultivation Sites
description: The drug cultivation dataset contains information on coca bush, opium poppy, and cannabis cultivation through the world.
details: Dataset downloaded August 2017. This is a categorical raster dataset indicating drug type covering each pixel.

extract_types_info.categorical: Drug type. Note: 'mix' is an additional category for cells that contain more than one drug type.
extract_types_info.count: total count of pixels per unit of analysis

options.variable_description: drug category (cannabis, coca bush, opium, mix)
